::DrillBit::

DrillBit takes one of Adrax's shots in the shoulder.
"Aarrg! Lord Megatron, we are attacked from above, and are base is under
attack, I suggest we retreat." Says DrillBit opening fire from his
gattaling gun, at Adrax.
